zh-cn: 恩仁·玛利亚·若瑟·若望·派契利

death_place.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈冈多菲堡宗座宫
death_place.en: Apostolic Palace of Castel Gandolfo, Vatican City

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第260任教宗，原名恩仁·玛利亚·若瑟·若望·派契利。曾任驻巴伐利亚大使、驻普鲁士大使、国务枢机卿和总务枢机。2009年12月19日获列为可敬者。其教宗任期与第二次世界大战重叠。
description.en: The 260th Pope of the Catholic Church, born Eugenio Maria Giuseppe Giovanni Pacelli. He previously served as Apostolic Nuncio to Bavaria, Apostolic Nuncio to Prussia, Cardinal Secretary of State, and Camerlengo of the Holy Roman Church. He was proclaimed Venerable on 19 December 2009. His pontificate coincided with World War II.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会教宗，庇护十二世的前任，并将庇护十二世擢升为枢机。
description.en: Pope of the Catholic Church, predecessor of Pius XII, and who elevated Pius XII to the cardinalate.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会教宗，庇护十二世的继任者。
description.en: Pope of the Catholic Church, successor of Pius XII.

description.zh-cn: 意大利首都，庇护十二世的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Italy and the birthplace of Pope Pius XII.

description.zh-cn: 位于意大利冈多菲堡的宗座宫殿，是教宗的夏日驻地，也是庇护十二世的逝世地点。
description.en: An apostolic palace in Castel Gandolfo, Italy, serving as a summer residence for the Pope, and the place of death of Pope Pius XII.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大的基督教教会，由罗马主教（即教宗）领导。
description.en: The largest Christian church, led by the Bishop of Rome (the Pope).

description.zh-cn: 1805年至1918年间存在的德意志国家，庇护十二世曾在此担任大使。
description.en: A German state that existed from 1805 to 1918, where Pope Pius XII served as an ambassador.

description.zh-cn: 1918年至1947年间存在的德意志国家，庇护十二世曾在此担任大使。
description.en: A German state that existed from 1918 to 1947, where Pope Pius XII served as an ambassador.

description.zh-cn: 圣座国务院的负责人，负责圣座的政治和外交活动，庇护十二世曾担任此职。
description.en: The head of the Secretariat of State of the Holy See, responsible for the political and diplomatic activities of the Holy See. Pope Pius XII held this position.

en: Camerlengo of the Holy Roman Church

description.zh-cn: 在宗座出缺期间代理教宗管理圣座的枢机，庇护十二世曾担任此职。
description.en: A cardinal who administers the Holy See during a papal vacancy. Pope Pius XII held this position.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，庇护十二世的教宗任期大部分时间与此重叠。
description.en: A global military conflict that largely coincided with the pontificate of Pope Pius XII.

description.zh-cn: 保存圣座所有法案的中央档案库。其馆藏中关于庇护十二世的档案于2020年3月起解密。
description.en: The central archive for all acts promulgated by the Holy See. Its archives concerning Pope Pius XII were opened to researchers in March 2020.

description.zh-cn: 玛利诺会士神父，于1952年在香港创立了庇护十二学校。
description.en: A Maryknoll priest who founded the Pius XII School in Hong Kong in 1952.

location.zh-cn: 香港九龙牛头角复华村
location.en: Fuk Wah Village, Ngau Tau Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 一所由玛利诺会士顾伦神父创办并以教宗庇护十二世命名的小学，于1979年被清拆。
description.en: A primary school founded by Maryknoll priest John A. Curran and named after Pope Pius XII, which was demolished in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 天主教香港教区主教，于1953年为庇护十二学校奠基。
description.en: Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong, who laid the foundation stone for the Pius XII School in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 一个天主教传教修会，在香港创办了包括庇护十二学校在内的多所学校。
description.en: A Catholic society of apostolic life for foreign missions that founded several schools in Hong Kong, including the Pius XII School.

nodes.id: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

zh-cn: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 二战时期的苏联领导人，曾嘲讽教宗庇护十二世缺乏军事力量。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union during World War II who famously mocked Pope Pius XII for his lack of military power.

description.zh-cn: 二战时期的英国首相，曾与斯大林讨论过教宗的立场。
description.en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during World War II, who discussed the Pope's position with Stalin.

en: Chai Wan Kok Catholic Primary School

description.zh-cn: 位于香港荃湾的一所小学，接收了部分原庇护十二学校的教职员。
description.en: A primary school in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong, which received some of the staff from the original Pius XII School.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的香港教区，从玛利诺会接管了柴湾角天主教小学的办学权。
description.en: The diocese of the Catholic Church in Hong Kong, which took over the operation of Chai Wan Kok Catholic Primary School from Maryknoll.

description.zh-cn: 由柴湾角天主教小学上午校于2009年迁校并改名而成。
description.en: Formed in 2009 when the morning session of Chai Wan Kok Catholic Primary School relocated and was renamed.

en: Ngau Tau Kok Catholic Primary School

description.zh-cn: 由玛利诺会创办的小学，于2000年迁往乐华邨并延续为乐华天主教小学。
description.en: A primary school founded by Maryknoll, which relocated to Lok Wah Estate in 2000 and continued as Lok Wah Catholic Primary School.

description.zh-cn: 由牛头角天主教小学于2000年迁校后延续的学校，现址位于原庇护十二学校校址。
description.en: The continuation of Ngau Tau Kok Catholic Primary School after its relocation in 2000, now located on the former site of Pius XII School.

description.zh-cn: 庇护十二世在庇护十一世逝世后，继任为教宗。
description.en: Pius XII succeeded Pius XI as Pope after the latter's death.

description.zh-cn: 教宗庇护十一世于1929年12月16日将时任大使的派契利（后来的庇护十二世）擢升为枢机。
description.en: Pope Pius XI elevated then-Nuncio Pacelli (the future Pius XII) to the rank of cardinal on 16 December 1929.

description.zh-cn: 若望二十三世在庇护十二世逝世后，继任为教宗。
description.en: John XXIII succeeded Pius XII as Pope after the latter's death.

description.zh-cn: 维基文本中任期结束年份为1940年，但与其1930年开始担任国务枢机卿的记录冲突，故根据历史背景调整为1929年。
description.en: The end year in the Wikitext is 1940, which conflicts with his tenure as Cardinal Secretary of State starting in 1930. The date has been adjusted to 1929 based on historical context.

description.zh-cn: 庇护十二世的教宗任期与第二次世界大战重叠，这段时期的梵蒂冈政策备受关注和争议。
description.en: The pontificate of Pius XII coincided with World War II, and the Vatican's policies during this period are a subject of considerable attention and controversy.

description.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈秘密档案馆于2020年3月起解密关于庇护十二世在任教宗期间的档案，影响了对其历史角色的研究和评价。
description.en: The Vatican Secret Archives began unsealing documents from the pontificate of Pope Pius XII in March 2020, influencing the research and evaluation of his historical role.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，玛利诺会士顾伦神父于香港九龙牛头角复华村设立了庇护十二学校。
description.en: In 1952, Maryknoll priest John A. Curran established the Pius XII School in Fuk Wah Village, Ngau Tau Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 庇护十二学校以教宗庇护十二世的名字命名。
description.en: The Pius XII School was named after Pope Pius XII.

description.zh-cn: 白英奇主教于1953年1月25日为庇护十二学校奠基。
description.en: Bishop Lorenzo Bianchi laid the foundation stone for the Pius XII School on January 25, 1953.

relationships.source: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 二战时期，苏联领导人斯大林在与丘吉尔的谈话中，曾以“教宗！他有几个师？”来嘲讽庇护十二世缺乏军事力量，体现了敌对和轻蔑的态度。
description.en: During World War II, Soviet leader Stalin, in a conversation with Churchill, mocked Pope Pius XII's lack of military power by asking, "The Pope! How many divisions has he got?", showing a hostile and dismissive attitude.

relationships.target: 约瑟夫·维萨里奥诺维奇·斯大林

description.zh-cn: 二战时期，英国首相丘吉尔曾向苏联领导人斯大林表达了他对于教宗立场的担忧。
description.en: During World War II, British Prime Minister Winston Churchill expressed his concerns about the Pope's position to Soviet leader Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 庇护十二学校由玛利诺会士顾伦神父创办，并且与牛头角天主教小学同属玛利诺会创办的学校。
description.en: The Pius XII School was founded by Maryknoll priest John A. Curran and, like the Ngau Tau Kok Catholic Primary School, was founded by Maryknoll.

description.zh-cn: 文本提及，牛头角天主教小学和庇护十二学校同是由玛利诺会所创办。
description.en: The text mentions that Ngau Tau Kok Catholic Primary School and Pius XII School were both founded by Maryknoll.
